messages.message: perhaps reframing the question - what is the purpose of the instabase desktop? is there room for customization, app shortcuts, etc?

Ah! yes, eventually. :) We’ve been gradually transforming our desktop into a more traditional OS look. last year/early this year, we transformed the user experience to an app centric experience (from a file centric one) and that allowed us to build the app explorer, the dock, restructure our bookmarks and search bar.
but we needed to shift our focus to deep learning so moved away from this as it was already a huge improvement from the previous experience
we’ll come back to this when we build out a larger team and can find the time for more customizations
Gotcha, that makes sense! Thank you for the context :slightly_smiling_face:
